---
title: Plot Layout
date: "2023-08-25"
output: html
---

::: {.cell hash='plot-layout_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_a015e7615ad8ac52469cda39ecdc9738'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```
:::


## Figure layout, ncol


::: {.cell layout-ncol="2" hash='plot-layout_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_54d2ebbbc86e86d97d4bf0b30afa4051'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| layout-ncol: 2
#| fig-cap:
#|   - "Speed and Stopping Distances of Cars"
#|   - "Engine displacement and fuel efficiency in Cars"

cars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point()

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = disp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Speed and Stopping Distances of Cars](plot-layout_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=2100}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Engine displacement and fuel efficiency in Cars](plot-layout_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-2.png){width=2100}
:::
:::


## Subcaptions:


::: {#fig-charts .cell layout-ncol="2" hash='plot-layout_cache/html/fig-charts_9b37e44ffbb26ebf4e084da5e37acf67'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| label: fig-charts
#| fig-cap: Charts
#| fig-subcap:
#|   - "Cars"
#|   - "mtcars"
#| layout-ncol: 2

cars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point()

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = disp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Cars](plot-layout_files/figure-html/fig-charts-1.png){#fig-charts-1 width=2100}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![mtcars](plot-layout_files/figure-html/fig-charts-2.png){#fig-charts-2 width=2100}
:::

Charts
:::


## Figure layout, custom


::: {.cell layout="[[45,-10,45],[50,50]]" layout-align="center" hash='plot-layout_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_e7edd0811f0aae74d449082d2e17f019'}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| layout: [[45,-10, 45], [50, 50]]
#| fig-height: 5
#| fig-align: center
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| dpi: 300

cars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20))

cars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point()+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20))

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = disp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20))

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = cyl, y = mpg, group = cyl, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20))
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](plot-layout_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){fig-align='center' width=2100}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](plot-layout_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-2.png){fig-align='center' width=2100}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](plot-layout_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-3.png){fig-align='center' width=2100}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](plot-layout_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-4.png){fig-align='center' width=2100}
:::
:::
